name: Tier 3 Ranged Critical Hits (Levels 9-12)
description: Critical hit effects for ranged attacks at Tier 3 (Levels 9-12). Effects are powerful for experienced adventurers.

results.text: Nothing Special - Your critical strike deals damage as normal, but no additional effect occurs.
Double Pierce - Your shot passes through and hits a second target behind the first for full damage.
Crippling Shot - Your shot shatters bone. Target's speed is halved until magically healed.
Arterial Hit - Your shot strikes a major artery. Target takes 2d6 damage at the start of each turn until healed.
Blinding Shot - Your shot strikes near or in the target's eyes. They are blinded for 1 minute or until healed.
Pinned to Wall - Your shot pins the target to a nearby surface. They are restrained until they use an action to pull free.
Devastating Shot - Your perfectly placed shot deals an additional 3d6 piercing damage.
Heart Shot - Your shot strikes true to a vital organ. Target must make DC 18 Con save or drop to 0 HP if under 30 HP.
